Package model

Class Select

java.lang.Object
model.DrawingTool
model.Select
public class Select extends DrawingTool
Select: Represents a drawing tool for selecting and manipulating objects on the canvas. This class provides functionality for selecting and manipulating objects on the canvas. It allows users to click and drag to select objects and perform actions like moving or resizing the selection.
Version:
1.6
Author:
Hannibal, Doom Al Rajhi

    • draw

      public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas, double x, double y)
      Draw method to draw a box from the start point at the first click to the end point at the second (The box is currently a line) TODO set the outline to be a square encasing the area once the shape method is done
      Specified by:
      draw in class DrawingTool
      Parameters:
      canvas - The canvas on which to draw.
      x - The x-coordinate of the drawing point.
      y - The y-coordinate of the drawing point.

    • drawDragged

      public void drawDragged(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas, double x, double y)
      Description copied from class: DrawingTool
      Abstract method that must be implemented by subclasses. This method is responsible for handling continuous drawing as the mouse is dragged.
      Specified by:
      drawDragged in class DrawingTool
      Parameters:
      canvas - The canvas on which to draw.
      x - The x-coordinate of the current drawing point.
      y - The y-coordinate of the current drawing point.

    • moveSelected

      public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas moveSelected(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double x, double y)
      Description copied from class: DrawingTool
      Abstract method that must be implemented by subclasses. This method is responsible for handling the movement of a selected drawing element.
      Specified by:
      moveSelected in class DrawingTool
      Parameters:
      gc - The GraphicsContext for drawing.
      x - The new x-coordinate for the selected element.
      y - The new y-coordinate for the selected element.
      Returns:
      A Canvas object representing the updated drawing after the movement.

    • selectPixels

      public javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext selectPixels(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
      A method that gets selected pixels and creates a WriteableImage from them
      Parameters:
      canvas - gc is the input GraphicsContext object
      Returns:
      selectedImage is the WriteableImage created from the selected pixels

    • mouseReleased

      public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas mouseReleased(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double x, double y)
      Draw method to finalize the location at which you want to drop your selection on the main canvas
      Specified by:
      mouseReleased in class DrawingTool
      Parameters:
      gc - The GraphicsContext for drawing.
      x - The x-coordinate where the mouse button was released.
      y - The y-coordinate where the mouse button was released.
      Returns:
      A Canvas object representing the updated drawing after the mouse release.
